availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard P. West (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ellena Burnside West in Garrard County, Kentucky, on January 30, 1827. Father of Joseph West, Ongisley West, Catharine West, Jemima West, Nancy West, Thomas E. West, James West, Eliza West. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Garrard County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 209A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 45.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, Film #000183256, p. 474.
Find A Grave, "Richard P West (1808-1868)," Memorial #41963164, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41963164 (accessed May 4, 2020).
